comments.raw_text: This is similar to bug 628363, except the conditions for which it happens: a dalvikvm is started for fennec at device boot, though the real thing is not started, but the process is still the same.

comments.text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> This is similar to bug 628363, except the conditions for which it happens: a
> dalvikvm is started for fennec at device boot, though the real thing is not
> started, but the process is still the same.

I'm guessing the best fix is to check startup time in android library loader, and then set MOZ_APP_RESTART=now() if process is more than a second old.
